author: dain
msg: Merged WritableContext and UnmodifiableContext together by adding fine grained a ContextAccess object to AbstractFederatedContext.  Currently only a blunt "the whole tree is (un)modifible" flag is implemented but we can easily implement a more fine grained approach.

author: awhite
msg: Add ability to include one fetch group in another to FetchGroup annotation.

author: carlos
msg: Add ROLE_admin to the possible values

author: carlos
msg: Add xwork ExceptionInterceptor that ignores Acegi exceptions, as Acegi can handle them
